{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Asus RT-AC52U 01.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = AC750 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Router |caption2 = with two high-gain antennas and USB port |pp = https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC52U-B1/ |sp = https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC52U-B1/HelpDesk/ |dl = https://www.asus.com/Networking/RT-AC52U-B1/HelpDesk_Download/ |wikidevi = ASUS_RT-AC52U_B1 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = ASUS |model = RT-AC52U |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = B1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC750 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = MSQ-RTAC52U |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = H19804PN752A1 |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7620A; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24KEc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 580 <!-- 580 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = 32-bit
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = GigaDevice;GD25Q128CSIG; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5TU32M16EG-AC; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8367RB; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 2C:4D:54 |oui = 2C:4D:54
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;2.6.36;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, J2,, |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = AiCloud support |addchip = 5GHz Front End Module (FEM);Skyworks;SKY85712-21;SKY21, 65712, G41WC;1; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = ASUS, ASUS_5G |defaultssid_regex = ^ASUS$,,, ^ASUS_5G$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = SGE |manuf_model = PN752 |manuf_rev = A1 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Padavan (WiP)
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 03/27/2017 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B016YJUZQY |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = MediaTek;MT7610E; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 1 |rad2rxchains = 1 |rad2sstreams = 1 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 433 |rad2n = 150 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "H19804PN752A1", "E248779" and "1647" (11/2016) :is silkscreened on the board in the photos.
Future support may be available with {{TPFirmware|Padavan}} ? (WiP) :The bootloader used is assumed to be '''U-Boot'''. Default SSIDs are per the manual. :PN: 90IG00D0-BU2N00 (B00T2PVGNE) :PN: 90IG00D0-BM3N00 (B00HWR17MO) Combo (+ USB-AC50 adapter)
===Additional specifications=== * USB functionality: 3G/4G, printer server, network storage * Multiple SSIDs: up to 6 (3x 2.4 GHz, 3x 5 GHz) * Antennas: 2x external 5dBi antenna, 1x internal antenna * Operation mode: Wireless router, Access point, Media bridge * Dimensions (W x D x H): [[Dimensions::189 mm x 129 mm x 36 mm]] * Weight: [[Weight::270 g]]
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[https://itwriter.ru/2017/03/27/asus-rt-ac52u-b1/ ''Asus RT-AC52U B1'' on '''IT|Writer'''] (RU) *[https://www.redeszone.net/asus/rt-ac52u-b1-ac750/ ''Asus RT-AC52U B1'' on '''RedesZone'''] (ES)
===Forum threads=== *[http://forums.smallnetbuilder.com/showthread.php?p=80332 On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] (EN) *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:60674 On '''iXBT'''] (RU)
